Text: Failure to deliver poweris just to confirm our conversation over the phone on at about AM Pacific Time You stated that Enron will not be able to deliver the MW HLH energy MID C product to Grays Harbor PUD starting at HE for Pursuant to Section of the WSPP Agreement we will take steps to mitigate damages for failure to deliver power Please reply with your written confirmation Thanks Kien Hoang Power Scheduler Power Resource Managers LLP Phone Fax
